ModMetaData.name: Hide Blueprints
ModMetaData.author: kathanon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a toggle button to hide all blueprint ghosts, so that it is easier to see what is already there.
There is a keybind for the toggle, but it is not bound to any key per default.
In the settings, you can choose in what ways hidden blueprints should be interactable and if they should be automatically shown when placing new blueprints or when simply having the Architect menu open.
